amendment.description: Amendment ensures that the VA will use its resources to provide veterans with necessary health care services by investing in information technology so that veterans health care records can be available digitally to their health care providers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds in contravention of subtitle D of title VIII of the Carl Levin and Howard P. "Buck" McKeon National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2015.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hurd (TX) amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hurd (TX) amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Hurd (TX).
